definition: mainland China (PRC excluding Hong Kong and Macau, but including islands such as Hainan)/Japan (used in Taiwan during Japanese colonization)
-ly/structural particle: used before a verb or adjective, linking it to preceding modifying adverbial adjunct

sentences.english: My reasons to go upcountry are varied.
sentences.chinese: 我走向內地的原因有很多。

sentences.english: Companies from the mainland accounted for 46 of the 66 new listings on the Hong Kong exchange this year.
sentences.chinese: 在香港新上市的66家企業中，有46家來自內地。

sentences.english: ' Although the cost of shipping goods from Nanjing and other mainland airports has fallen dramatically.
sentences.chinese: 儘管從南京及其它內地機場運輸貨物的費用大幅下降。

sentences.english: Description: Operates flights between Hong Kong and destinations in Mainland China.
sentences.chinese: 營運來往香港及中國內地航點的航班。

sentences.english: Value of total assets, the CDB is China's fifth largest commercial bank.
sentences.chinese: 以總資產值計算，國開行是內地第五大商業銀行。

sentences.english: The higher education of inland can get some enlight…
sentences.chinese: 這些，對於我國內地高等教育有一定的啓示。

sentences.english: We have had a continuous presence in the Mainland for more than 135 years.
sentences.chinese: 我們在中國內地的業務從未間斷，已超過了135年。

sentences.english: Heavy selling triggered Beijing's limit on how much yuan banks can officially buy from or sell back to the mainland.
sentences.chinese: 拋售達到了北京對銀行向內地買賣的人民幣額度限制。

sentences.english: You said you wanted to own a house upcountry , is this still your dream?
sentences.chinese: 你說過想在內地買房子，這個還是你的夢想嗎？

sentences.english: Coastal cities were slow in development while inland cities experience considerable growth.
sentences.chinese: 沿海城市發展滯緩，內地城市有了一些發展。

sentences.english: Also, the council maintains regular contacts with its counterparts overseas and in the Mainland.
sentences.chinese: 消委會與海外及內地的消費者機構保持密切聯繫。
殖民者更深入地向內地發展。

sentences.english: The products of inland provinces and municipalities can get access to the international market through the coastal port cities.
sentences.chinese: 內地省市的產品可以通過沿海港口城市打向國際市場。

sentences.english: General Penney commanding the British first Division was anxious to push inland.
sentences.chinese: 指揮英軍第一師的彭尼將軍迫切地希望向內地推進。

sentences.english: Horse race betting in the Mainland has yet to lifting the ban.
sentences.chinese: 賽馬博彩在內地至今尚未開禁。

sentences.english: Many years later, but went to work in Xiamen, snow in the mainland.
sentences.chinese: 好多年過後，彬去了廈門工作，瑞雪留在了內地。

definition: Asia/abbr. for 亞細亞洲|亚细亚洲[Ya4 xi4 ya4 Zhou1]
variant of 臺灣|台湾[Tai2 wan1]
